Blog.post: wow, w...a...t...i. tadi ketemu wati dan diceramahin abis-abissan. well, kita tak harus berbelok setiap ada tikungan. aku tak ingin lagi menebak-nebak. aku hanya ingin menjalani semuanya sesuai dengan kemampuanku dengan harapan suatu saat,aku bisa. gosh... tapi yang jelas tadi tambah ilmu. wati sayang, makasih... back to the topik dari tadi sore mau nulis ini, eh lampunya mati untuk 7 tahun yang tersia-siakan seharusnya sekarang aku udah bisa macam-macam program komputer, juga udah bisa bongkar pasang komputer. seharusnya saat ini aku sudah menguasai minimal 5 bahasa. seharusnya saat ini aku udah S2. tapi kalau memang aku sudah mencapai itu saat ini, apakah aku juga sudah bisa mengetahui beberapa fakta dasar ttg hidup? mungkin tidak. dan untuk itu aku seharusnya bersyukur. andai aku t'lah dewasa apa yang kan kukatakan untukmu idolaku, tersayang...ayah andai usiaku berubah kubalas cintamu...bunda pelitaku, penerang jiwaku di setiap waktu... ku tahu kau berharap dalam doamu ku tahu kau berjaga dalam langkahmu ku tahu s'lalu cinta dalam senyummu tuhan...kau kupinta bahagiakan mereka sepertiku

for me, love is about chemistry and open heart. a relationship is something more than that. a little adjustment, a lot of acceptance, a bound of understanding. its rely hard to start all over again. but trust me it's not when you've already tried. but still there will be the hardest part. it's when you realize that you let the people whose love u hurt and sad b'cause of the thing that u do. the time that you realize u've wasted so many time, love and the gift given by god. yes guys, sorry is the hardest part, make u wanna cry every time it crosses your mind. but u have to get straight r8 away. don't let it make u weak, 'cause if u do, another regretfull is waiting.

my life is not to impress people. i only wanna do good and usefull things. but i have to admitt that i'm scared to be hated if i do something wrong wich i tought was right. that's why i always doubt my act. so i might seem have no trust to my self. gosh. when i do something that i believe is right. i can't believe in my self completely. and it makes me don't do a thing with my full power. and the result must be disappointed.
hi, blog ku sayang. aku menyesal...
ujian tadi dikerjain cuma 40 menit. soalnya open book. aku lagi mikirin mr-x nih...

hari ini ujian rekpon I, kayaknye ndak susah sih (kalau open book) kalau ndak tewaslah, banyak rumus yang lagi malas di ingat. aku lagi ade masalah lama dengan x-boyfriend. kasian die, susah gara-gara aku. acam mane ni...???
test, test. bikin blog baru nih...

i hate that song the first time i heard it. n i don't like alanis morrisette either. but now i realize that she's rite. every step we make in our life is another lesson for us. aware or unaware. well i haven't learn for awhile. it makes me have too study from the beginning again. but thats fine...at least i have a chance. i will not let it go anymore. although i have to study harder and double time.

i've fallen in love before. i never fall again ever since biological attraction, maybe... but love???, i'm not so sure n if someday i fall in love again trust me i'll noe but everything now is just ok yes there are problems. but problems should be deal with not messing so guys ... let's get back to work
i have alot of works today. i got my eyes irritated. chai yoa, ganbatte ne!! wish me luck
i don't noe, how's today going to be...but i'm sure that its all gonna be alright
